# Angular Portfolio - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern Angular 20+ portfolio with standalone components, Signals, and innovative design.

## Tech Stack
- Angular 20+ with Standalone Components
- Tailwind CSS 4 with custom theme
- GSAP 3+ for animations
- Three.js for 3D effects
- TypeScript 5.6+ strict mode

## Design System
- Primary: Deep Indigo (#1a1a3e)
- Accent: Electric Violet (#9D4EDD)
- Secondary: Soft Cyan (#00D9FF), Teal (#00B8CC)
- Typography: Outfit (sans), Playfair Display (serif)
- Style: Glassmorphism + Neumorphism

## Architecture
- Feature-based folder structure
- Lazy-loaded routes
- OnPush change detection
- Signals for state management
- RxJS for async operations

## Commands
- `npm start` - Development server
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run test` - Unit tests
- `npm run lint` - ESLint check
